participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for crafting and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I have a stuffed animal that I keep on my bed. I collect interesting things I find on my couch. I like to read and ski. I enjoy making things for my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Driven and resourceful, with a passion for cooking and entrepreneurship.
participant_2.background: I wonder if my uncle would be able to give me some pointers about fishing. I am driven and tenacious, and I will not stop until I achieve my goals. I refuse to ride the bus. I am content with my life. I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.

content.text: Hi, I am interested in your business. I am a big fan of meatloaf.
Thanks, it's a lot of work, but it's worth it.
How did you get into the business of making meatloaf?
I used to be a personal chef, and I would make meatloaf for my clients. They all loved it, so I decided to start my own business.
That's great! I am sure you are very successful.
What's your favorite kind of meatloaf?
I love making a traditional meatloaf with ketchup and brown sugar.
I also love making a vegetarian meatloaf with mushrooms and vegetables.
That sounds interesting, I would love to try it.
I can give you a recipe if you want.
